Moon Shots: Inside the Lost Apollo Archive, 20160101080000 +0000, The world famous Apollo missions are some of the greatest feats ever accomplished by man. With rare archive footage and unprecedented access to life on board the Apollo spacecrafts, this stunning one-hour special brings scientific history to life.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.desc: The Apollo Experience: Apollo 17: Part 1, S01E01, Between 1960 and 1972, mankind boldly went where no human had been before. Across 11 manned missions, 24 men flew to the moon and 12 walked upon its surface. This film documents Apollo 17 through the eyes of the astronauts who flew.

programme.title: Part 2

programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E13, In 1982 and '83, Seattle's Green River Killer stalked prostitutes like game. With 49 victims, he could be the deadliest serial killer in U.S. history. Then, a passing motorist spots a fire along a road in South Carolina and calls it in.

programme.title: Diary Of A Serial Arsonist/The Lost Clue
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E10, A highly-regarded California arson investigator is suspected of setting a series of fires, and in Texas, a man is convicted of raping and murdering his 68-year-old neighbor.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E4016, DNA evidence found on a murder victim whose body had been dumped in a Dairy Queen drive-thru leads to the arrest of Houston's notorious "tourniquet killer."

programme.title: Til Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E24, Just two years into their marriage, Chuck and Cheryl Hall are torn apart when Chuck finds Cheryl murdered. Though Cheryl's family is certain they know her killer, the law isn't as sure. After several decades, a DNA match erases all doubt.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E17, A look at the case of James Allen Selby, a serial rapist who eluded police for years while attacking 11 women in five states - Oklahoma, Nevada, California, Arizona, and Colorado.

programme.title: Texas Drifter/Fingerprints/Rose Among Thorns
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E03, From England to Texas to Georgia, I.R. will go inside cold case units and watch as police use ballistics testing, old fashioned fingerprints and a new DNA data bank for criminals, to crack open the mysteries of unsolved crimes.

programme.title: Friday Night Ghosts
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E15, In late 1983, the bodies of five people abducted from a local fast food restaurant are found brutally murdered. The main suspect is long believed to be a well-connected local man, until new evidence reveals the true killers.

programme.title: Eyes of a Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E13, On February 2, 2010, two masked gunmen commit a violent robbery and shoot Michael Temple Jr., rendering him a quadriplegic for five years before his death. In this unusual cold case, DNA is used to create a sketch of the killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E5011, Nine years after the murders of a mother and her teenage daughters, a wiretapped conversation helps police to crack the case. And the baffling murder of a Virginia woman is solved when human bones are discovered by a geologist in North Carolina.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E24, Guns found dumped in a pond help police to solve the 15-year-old murder of Detroit cab company owner. And the rape and murder of an Atlanta TV station receptionist goes cold for 20 years before DNA links a man to the crime.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E05, Law enforcement officials fear they may have to release a serial killer from prison until a 24-year-old murder case gives them a chance to lock him up for good.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E20, DNA found on a marijuana joint in Florida in 2005 helps to solve the 1988 rape and murder of a California woman. And a cold case of murder in Illinois heats up when a jailhouse lawyer turns jailhouse snitch.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E06, The murder of a 73-year-old man leads police on a long chase for a man who's suspected of identity theft and bears a rose tattoo with the name "Phyllis".

programme.title: The Original Nightstalker
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E05, In the 1980s, a serial killer prowled the posh streets of Orange County. Police were unaware of the serial attacks until 1996, when DNA revealed the killer's secret and they linked four murders to a single DNA profile.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic: Cold Case Files Classics, S02E26, Best of the Year Marathon: Serial Killers

programme.title: The Unearthly

programme.title: Untamed Youth
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Untamed Youth, S01E12, Joel invents a pipe with a smoke detector and a sprinkler system built in for the invention exchange. The guys watch a 1950s teen flick about youths sentenced to manual labor at a cotton farm.

programme.title: Warrior Of The Lost World
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Warrior Of The Lost World, S06E01, A nameless hero and his talking motorcycle fight an evil dictator in a post-apocalyptic world.

MST3K: Quest Of The Delta Knights, 19980926000000 +0000, Pearl sits in on part of this week's experiment as part of her annual review, and Leonardo da Vinci stops by.

programme.title: Exes Mark the Spot

programme.title: Secrets, Lies and School Supplies
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E01, Hallmark Original Series. Trace and the O'Briens attempt to put their own challenges aside.

Christmas with Tucker, 20131125000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Thirteen-year-old George struggles to deal with the death of his father.

programme.title: The Game
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E15, Lorne discovers a planet with dozens of satellites in orbit. However, inhabitants on this planet are no further advanced than the renaissance and have a flag with McKay's face. The team realize a game they had found earlier might be more than a game.

programme.title: The Ark
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E16, Investigating an abandoned space station, McKay mistakenly brings one of its scientists out of stasis. The scientist explains to the team that the base was the last effort by his people to avoid the repeated culling they've endured by the Wraith.

programme.title: Sunday
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E17, With the entire city ordered to take a personal day the team does their best to unwind and enjoy their leisure time. Without warning a mysterious explosion rips through the city killing and injuring unsuspecting citizens.

Stargate Origins: Catherine, 20180619000000 +0000, 'Stargate Origins' follows Catherine Langford, whose father, archeologist Paul Langford, discovered the eponymous Stargate in 1928, when Catherine was a young girl. Young Catherine explores the mysteries of the Stargate in an attempt to save Earth.

Stargate: Continuum, 20080729000000 +0000, In this adrenaline-driven, action-adventure, members of SG-1 find themselves returning to a world where their history has been dramatically altered and the Stargate program never existed! Richard Dean Anderson, Beau Bridges, and Michael Shanks star.

Stargate: The Ark of Truth, 20080101080000 +0000, When the SG-1 crew discovers that a final assault on Earth is in the works and a double-agent is scheming among them, their mission takes on a new meaning as they travel to the Ori's home galaxy to overtake their arch enemy before it's too late.

programme.title: In The Line Of Duty
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E02, On a daring mission to rescue victims of an interplanetary attack, Carter's body is inhabited by a Goa'uld. And now that Carter has brought the demon back to Earth inside her, the SG-1 team must find a way to destroy it....without destroying Carter!

programme.title: Prisoners
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E03, When the SG-1 team inadvertently helps a desperate criminal, they are charged as accessories to murder and banished to a penal colony. Only one woman there has the power to help them escape....but freedom might not be worth the price she is asking!

programme.title: The Gamekeeper
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E04, Exploring a strange and beautiful garden in a distant world, the team members are trapped, knocked unconscious, and forced to relive their most haunting memories. Now, before they can find their way back home, they must find the way back to reality.

programme.title: Need
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E05, On a mysterious planet, Jackson (Michael Shanks) saves the life of a beautiful princess, but his heroics cause the SG-1 team to be taken prisoner. Jackson and the princess fall in love, but his romance could spell doom for the entire SG-1 team!

programme.title: Thor's Chariot
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E06, O'Neill and the SG-1 team travel to the planet of Cimmeria to protect it from a massive Goa'uld attack, but they are quickly outnumbered and overpowered. Can they solve an ancient Cimmerian riddle in time to save the planet…and themselves?

programme.title: Message In A Bottle
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E07, A seemingly harmless orb from a dead world is brought back to the base through the Stargate, but the strange device infects O'Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) with an alien organism. Now, the only chance to save him is to let the organism control him!

programme.title: Family
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E08, SG-1 goes on a mission to rescue Teal'c's son, Rya'c, from the grasp of Apophis. But, when they finally reach Rya'c, he doesn't want to be saved -- he's been brainwashed and has accepted Apophis as his god! Can Teal'c find a way to win back his son?

programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E09, The Stargate project is imperiled when a reporter threatens to expose the top-secret portal. O'Neill attempts to stop him while the rest of the team tries to save Jackson's wife who has been impregnated with a Goa'uld. Is this the end of Stargate?

programme.title: Cretin of the Shallows
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E10, Several people are murdered at the beach by a mysterious man in ghoulish make-up and Eddie is knocked unconscious by what he describes as a "cretin." Eddie's report is met with skepticism until the identity of the killer is dramatically revealed.

programme.title: Shelter Me
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E11, During a tropical storm, Eddie and Shauni take refuge in the Pomeroy's loft, turning a cold night into the start of a hot romance. In the downpour, two escaped convicts shoot Garner, then break into Baywatch headquarters and take everyone hostage.

programme.title: The Reunion
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E12, Craig gets jealous when Mitch reunites with his and Craig’s old flame. Meanwhile, Eddie buys a classic Mustang for cheap, only to get arrested for possession of a stolen car.

programme.title: Armored Car
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E13, Jill teams up with Trevor to win a beach volleyball tournament, but all she really wants is to beat her former lover's team. Eddie and Shauni team up to rescue a young girl trapped in an armored car that topples off the pier into the ocean.

programme.title: Home Cort
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E14, Mitch gets a surprise visit from his old, mischievous Navy S.E.A.L. buddy and ex-Baywatch lifeguard, John Cort, adding serious problems in their already complicated relationship. And Shauni and Jill fight a battle of the sexes against a shady vendor.

programme.title: We Need a Vacation
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E15, Craig, Cort, and Eddie take a road trip to Mexico, but their vacation south of the border turns ugly when they tangle with an angry American tourist. Meanwhile, Captian Thorpe becomes Mitch's uninvited house guest. Hobie develops a crush on Shauni.

programme.title: Muddy Waters
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E16, Cort and Eddie train lifeguards at a water park, but someone is vandalizing the waterslides, putting people's lives in danger. Meanwhile, Captain Thorpe wants Shauni fired for posing in a provocative calendar.

programme.title: Snake Eyes
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E17, Eddie and Cort happen upon an illegal gambling ship. Meanwhile, Mitch begins to spend more time with Hobie's English teacher – a liaison that embarrasses Hobie beyond belief.

programme.title: Eclipse
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E18, After losing his rookie partner in the mysterious rescue of what he thinks is a ghost, Eddie gets unwittingly caught up in a 70-year-old legend. Meanwhile, Hobie attempts to help a friend find a new home for her dog.

programme.title: Shark Derby
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E19, A local restaurateur puts up a $25,000 bounty for the largest shark caught during the weekend's Shark Derby he's sponsoring. To attract more sharks, he illegally chums the waters, drawing hundreds of sharks uncommonly close to shore.

programme.title: The Big Race
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E20, Cort promises to come up with $10,000 for a nursing home, but he needs Mitch and Craig's help to compete in a water-skiing race with a big cash prize. Shauni’s traumatic fear of the ocean after Jill’s death threatens her future with Baywatch.

programme.title: Old Friends
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E21, Craig, Mitch, and Garner go for a weekend hang-gliding trip, but Mitch has a serious accident, and ends up facing death before the fangs of a rattlesnake! Cort reacquaints himself with a woman who has a shocking secret.

programme.title: The End?
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E22, A massive earthquake destroys Baywatch headquarters and leaves Gina's life hanging in the balance. Meanwhile, Cort and Craig are trapped in the ocean. And Eddie is the only one left who can help a pregnant woman going into labor.

programme.title: Nightmare Bay, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E01, Mitch rescues an underwater photographer that appears to have been attacked by a Sea Creature in an underwater cave, resulting in a media frenzy. Shauni rescues a young girl in the ocean then has to rescue her family from drowning.

programme.title: Nightmare Bay, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E02, When a fishing trawler mysteriously sinks, the “Creature in the Bay” is thought responsible! Mitch, Devon and Captain Thorpe set out to prove there is more than meets the eye behind this Creature's mysterious attacks.

programme.title: The One Who Got Away
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E03, After Baywatch lifeguard Megan is attacked on the beach, she struggles to regain her confidence – unaware that her attacker, a fisherman, views her as the "One That Got Away." Meanwhile, Shauni suffers from lifeguard burnout.

programme.title: Money, Honey
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E04, After Mitch makes a heroic ocean rescue while working at her private beach party, a Hollywood producer offers Mitch the starring role in a movie. Meanwhile, Harvey and Shauni hold a wild bikini contest to raise money for an aquatic rescue group.
